name: Exploring Facebook API
tagline: Facebook Graph API is an awesome place to retrive information about your friends,birthdays,hometowns, interests and can be used for many analytical purpose.
body:
### Project Introduction
This project was initiated to mostly explore the Graph API provided by Facebook.Python 2.7 is used to get access to JSON data provided by the API.
So lets get started.

## Getting the packages
Install the necessary python pckages ,either using 
```
pip install packagename
easy_install packagename
```
or download the package and try 
```
setup install
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
